name: Defend The Dam - Active Lane Defense
name_original: Defend The Dam - Active Lane Defense
description:
ACTION PACKED LANE DEFENSE
Defend The Dam is an action packed lane defense game with a new spin! Build awesome turrets. Rotate your weapons strategically to defend against the woodland horde! Upgrade and unlock new weapons, explore unique levels across multiple zones, and battle epic bosses.

ROTATE YOUR WEAPONS
Stationary turrets are no fun, so we put them on a tank tread! Rotate your weapons into battle so you can have the right weapon to deal with the right enemies!

CHALLENGE MODES
Once you've beat all the levels, test your skill on the Heroic and Master modes for each level, or create your own with challenge mode!

WEAPON UPGRADES
Upgrade each weapon with their own unique upgrades. Never pay to respec! Choose the upgrades you want to face each new challenge.

DAILY CHALLENGES
Compete for glory in our daily challenge mode!

******************************************************************
NOTE: Due to intense strategy action, Defend the Dam requires an iPhone 5 or newer, iPad 3 or newer, or iPad mini 2 or newer. The game is not supported on older devices.
